title: Feral Queen: An Apocalyptic Epidemic Survival Series (Feral Starve Book 2)
features: Her boyfriend rules the gang as king.Can she claim her place beside him as queen?Still trapped by the Ebola quarantine, death stalks Manhattan’s mean streets in the summer height of the Starve.Ava Panic stood beside Frosty from day one. She co-founded the gang and taught kids to fight for survival. But he named an older friend to lead the fighting girls. Panic managed the children, and struggled to keep the gang healthy and fed.Now the top girls – older, bigger, and vicious – dismiss her as Frosty’s pet.But their first queen died of typhus.Frosty doesn’t want Panic to step up. He knows what it costs to rule. He founded this gang to protect her, not destroy her. The gang wars intensify as he haggles and fights to win food for his people. The last thing he needs is a cat fight.Does Panic have what it takes to not only survive, but rule?
description: "Excellent! I Love Ava Panic! Packed with action and survival/Prepper tips, but YIKES they are living in hell. Trapped and starving and fighting to survive." -
"As friends die and gang members betray them, the price to survive keeps getting higher. It is compulsive reading." -
"Beautifully written and totally engrossing. These kids faced the impossible. They endured pain and loss and held on to each other." -
"Is she tough enough? Panic is smart, brave and skilled but it costs to lead." -
